output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
data("rest_inspec")
set.seed(12345)
data =  sample_n(rest_inspec, 1000) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(cuisine_description = str_sub(cuisine_description, start = 1, end = 3)) %>% 
  drop_na(score)
```

Column {data-width=400}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

## Histogram
```{r echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(data, x = ~score, color = ~critical_flag, type = 'histogram')
```

Column {data-width=200}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

## Boxplot
```{r echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(data, y = ~score, color = ~boro, type = 'box')
```

## Pieplot
```{r echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(data, labels = ~cuisine_description, type = 'pie')
```
